banner.second: Use InvestManager and see how your fund takes off

hero.title: Manage more investors in less time
hero.description: InvestManager automates administrative management for traders who manage investment funds and third-party capital. Maximize your returns and focus on what really matters, your operations.

problems.title: Your Own Investment Fund
problems.message: Managing your own investment fund can bring many benefits in the medium and long term, and can be an excellent strategy for an experienced investor or trader looking to climb the ranks in the financial industry. However, it's important to note that managing an investment fund comes with several challenges:

solution.title: Everything you need to manage your Investment Fund
solution.message: Our platform automates the administrative management of investment funds and third-party capital, saving you time and allowing you to focus on seeking better investment opportunities. It also includes a dashboard for investors to view their returns.

a.title: Save Time with Automation
a.description: Our platform streamlines the administrative work so that you can manage your investments more efficiently.

b.title: Hundreds of People in Minutes
b.description: Our platform makes it easy to manage the capital of hundreds of people with just a few minutes of work each day. You can quickly and efficiently manage investments, and set up new accounts.

c.title: Investor's Portal
c.description: Our platform makes it easy to manage the capital of hundreds of people with just a few minutes of work each day. You can quickly and efficiently manage investments, and set up new accounts.

d.title: Commission Rates
d.description: Establish commission rates that are competitive and fair, according to industry standards. This ensures that your investment business is competitive and attractive to investors.

e.title: Manage Funds in One Place
e.description: Our platform allows you to manage multiple investment funds in one place, streamlining your investment management process. You can easily create new funds and manage existing ones.

f.title: Maximum Data Protection
f.description: Our platform offers maximum data protection with a double weekly security backup. This ensures that your investment data is always safe and secure.

pricing.title: Pricing plans for Funds of all sizes
pricing.message: Whether you're just starting out or you already have experience, we offer plans for funds of all sizes, so that your fund can grow limitlessly.

classic.message: An ideal plan for those who want to start their first investment fund.

deluxe.message: An ideal plan for those who seek growth and don't settle for less.

elite.message: An ideal plan for those who break all limits and go for it all.
